favourite.article: Oh Lord Jesus! Thank You for Your church. Thank You that You have mercy and so we can see Your eternal purpose! Lord we want to recover and build up Your church!

Amen! Praise the Lord! Cause He is the life-giving Spirit, without Him we are not here. There will be no people in this world, and thank God because He saved us from the world which Satan rules. We are the God-called out and redeemed! Amen!

What a great hymn! Really enjoyed it. May the Lord grant is mercy to truly live out its reality. Rise up! Grow in life! Minister Christ to the nations, Arrive at oneness— Lord, have mercy, We would see Your eternal purpose. Keep us faithful To recover and build up Your church.
Ohh Lord, Amen, Hallelujah. Rise up, grow in life!! The church is the building up!
Praise the Lord for the church. Keep us faithful to recover and build up Your church!!
Praise the Lord we are the church! :)
Lord grant us mercy to see Your eternal purpose. Very touching lyrics. Amen.
Oh Lord have mercy, so we can see Your eternal purpose! :)
Amen, grow in life!! Thank You Lord for the church!!!
Rise up!! Grow in life! To recover and build up Your church!!
Thank You Lord for Your church.
Oh Lord have mercy that we would see Your eternal purpose! Keep us faithful to recover and build up Your church!!!
Praise the Lord! The church is the building up of all God's chosen, and redeemed, regenerated, and transformed people! The church is not a physical building but a group of chosen people.
Thank You for Your building. Jesus is Lord and always with us.
Oh!! Lord Jesus. AMEN, Praise The Lord!
Lord, have mercy on us so that we would see Your eternal purpose. Keep us faithful to recover and build up Your church.
Rise Up! Grow in life! Lord, Keep us faithful to recover and build up Your church!
Praise the Lord, Amen. We need to rise up and grow in life!!!!! Arrive at oneness, Lord have mercy, we would see Your eternal purpose. Keep us faithful to recover and build up Your church!!!!! Amen.
Praise the Lord for this hymn. I remember this hymn taught to me by a family 3 years ago. Now it's here on the hymnal that we can enjoy the words in this hymn. Amen.
Rise up! Grow in life! Praise the Lord! Philadelphia: They hold fast to God’s Word, Never denying His name, Living in the local church,
